extendedInfo.description: WGR â Sports Radio 550 is the only 24/7 sports source in Western New York and of the official voice of both the Buffalo Sabres and the Buffalo Bills.This app will allow you to listen to Buffaloâs only sports radio station anywhere you go, so you can stay up to date on everything going on in the Buffalo sports scene, and listen to all your favorite WGR hosts and shows anytime, anywhere. And, you wonât have to miss another Sabres game. *  While you are listening, make sure you keep up to date by using the rest of our app as we have linked our website directly into this app!  Get the latest sports news, read up on the opinions of our staff or check into our audio vault to listen to the best interviews we have to offer or the latest Sabres highlights. Download the WGR app today, and youâll never miss a beat from the Buffalo sports scene!*Broadcast regulations governed by the National Football League prevent WGR Sports Radio 550 from providing a live play by play broadcast of Buffalo Bills football on the WGR app. A stream of the game is available at WGR550.com and over the air at WGR 550 AM.

reviews.title: Can\'t listen on demand
reviews.comment: App worked great before this update! Fix on demand streaming please. I live outside the buffalo area and can only listen via the app and sometimes miss the live broadcast and have to listen on demand.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Audio always cuts out
reviews.comment: Great app.. except every time I open another app the audio cuts out.  When I try to return to the app, it crashes.  Same issues with the previous version.
reviews.author: Mike Weaver

reviews.title: Good BEFORE the last Update!!!
reviews.comment: It worked fine before the last update. A few glitches here and there but I could deal with that. But since the update, NO sound will play unless I am connected via WiFi. If I open the app while on 4GLTE or 3G no sound plays, and it won\'t close (quit). I have to FORECLOSE it through the app manager on my phone. I have Uninstalled it and reinstalled it and I got the same results. Is there a way to roll back an unwanted update? Please help! I am not in the Western NY area so this is the only way I can keep with the John Murphy show unless I am in front of a computer. And I am mostly NOT in front of a computer.  Phone : Samsung S4 Carrier: Sprint Network
reviews.author: Jerome Myers

reviews.comment: No audio.... new app sux.... Tuned In & old app works fine....  uninstalled.  Galaxy S4 on Sprint\tFinally get to listen..... Cuts out approx every 30 mins & I have to hit play again. Somewhat annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Newer design and look but does not work as well as older version. Wish i never updated. App keeps closing and now my phone locks up/freezes and it never did that before this new update. I have a droid and it works perfectly until this update. Hope they fix soon because I am a wgr/ Bills/Sabres fan and do not live in that area.
reviews.author: David Szemcsak

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: My favorite radio station even though Shopp can be a dick sometimes.
reviews.author: Christopher Witter

reviews.title: Don\'t like the new format
reviews.comment: Change it back to the old format I used to always use this app now I don\'t like it at all
reviews.author: Joe Honegger

reviews.title: Sweet app
reviews.comment: Bills Rule!
reviews.author: Jon Bresee

reviews.comment: Best app ever
reviews.author: brandon dinato-koontz

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: This app is useless you can\'t even listen to the Bills game...stupid!!!
reviews.author: Karen Kitchen

reviews.title: Goody
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Angelo Miller

reviews.title: Ouuuu fancy pants wgr
reviews.comment: Looks way better than that low budget look they used before
reviews.author: john boner

reviews.comment: Sports talk on my phone!
reviews.author: Doug Acquard

reviews.title: Update makes it less useful.
reviews.comment: Needs a quit button, again; late August 2013 version lost it. Coupled with the newly increased permissions (microphone? Really?) It loses two stars. Uninstalling so it isn\'t constantly running on my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use this app all the time
reviews.comment: Audio always stops - not pauses or buffers, stops - when using in the background.  Love this app, but frustrating to use most of the time.  Listening via TuneIn is more reliable lately.
reviews.author: Mike Arduini

reviews.title: Audio vault
reviews.comment: There should be a way to FF and RW audio clips, because if play is interrupted you have to start all over again. This is not good on long audio clips.
reviews.author: Mike M

reviews.title: WARNING if you have a Boost ZTE N9100
reviews.comment: Use this app and hope it works, if it doesn\342\200\231t good luck getting any help from the designers. I recently purchased a ZTE N9100 and the very first app I put on it was the WGR app. IT WONT WORK! So I notified the station of the issue and even sent specs on the phone to help. That was a month ago and still the app will not work. Add to that I\342\200\231ve called and left several messages to follow up and see if I can help further or if progress has been made. It would seem they could care less about the issue because the issue still exists and they refuse to answer back. I\342\200\231m not looking for special treatment, I just expect it to work the way it\342\200\231s supposed to.  I\342\200\231m a long time user of this app, practically since the day it opened. I love the app and the fact that I can keep up with the Buffalo sports scene, but they have issues internally and with the app that have become annoying. Yeah, it\342\200\231s common knowledge the app stops and starts (often), but what really bothers me are two things. A) WGR is seemingly satisfied with the stop and start issue and has don\342\200\231t nothing to address it for as long as it\342\200\231s gone on, and B) issues with new model phones and how they handle the
reviews.author: Len Genco

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Crashes a lot and have to start over in the audio vault. Need slider like on iphone version so you can fast forward back to where it left off before the crash.
reviews.author: Michael Migliore

reviews.title: Sabers fan
reviews.comment: I been waited so long I almost forgot about Rick jennerets voice I still haven\'t heard anything about him broadcasting that\'s stinks he was the greatest ever I miss his voice he was a big part of hockey announcing.bring him back please I will start a partitions.
reviews.author: James Sundquist

reviews.title: Chuck
reviews.comment: Cuts off often, cuts on without notice.
reviews.author: Chuck McDonald
